message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I think you'll find very valuable.  Given its potential benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,500.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?

Hi Bob, I understand your position on the price.  To find a middle ground, I'd be willing to come down to $12,800. This offer reflects the true value of the product and the benefits it will bring you.
